product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Magic hour is a gorgeous and flattering rosy color that for me, looks more pink than orangey as other reviewers had mentioned. A little does go a long way but the color quickly fades and becomes barely noticeable after a brief few hours. It does leave a slightly dewy look on the cheeks even after the color fades. Not sure if that’s because of my oily skin, but reapplying the color is easy albeit a minor inconvenience. I’ve been using this product for a while and have never broken out or had any reactions to it.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
I’ve been on a real cream blush/bronzer kick recently, with surprisingly good results, and this blush is no exception. Though I can only speak to Magic Hour, if you’re looking for an alternative to the sheer goodness of Fenty’s new blushes, you’re in luck. I dipped my brush into this pan just once, and had more than enough product to blush up both sides of my face. This product is beyond pigmented, but so smooth and easy to apply. The texture is creepy, but it sets on the skin and doesn’t feel tacky. One star off simply because Magic Hour isn’t the best shade for me - I like a bit of color contrast on my skin, and this definitely comes off peachy & monochromatic. That being said, I can’t wait to try this in another shade!

review_content:
I have two shades--Magic Hour and Happy Hour--and I adore them both. The formula is so unique on these and I feel like they're foolproof to use. They blend out seamlessly onto the cheeks using either a beautyblender or a slightly denser brush, they dry down without feeling sticky or tacky, and the lasting power is surprisingly long. Even for someone who doesn't have a lot of experience using cream products, these are a dream to work with and create such a beautiful look. The color can easily be built up or sheered out and I never have a problem with it looking unnatural or patchy. These are absolute perfection and I can't get enough! Don't hesitate to try these, especially for the price; money well-spent, can't recommend highly enough.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I was hoping that this would look similar to Tata Harper in Very Popular. It does not. Very Popular remained a true dusty rose. The shade Magic Hour by Tower 28 pulls something similar to a pale lilac-pink on my skin. Overall, I don't mind the formula. It initially felt more like a lip gloss but dried down fine. It didn't remain sticky or tacky after it dried. It did not disrupt my tinted moisturizer base. Wear time wasn't the best. Being that it is such a pale/light color, on my currently tanned skin, that is likely why it was more noticeably absent by hour four. I do like the formula enough that I'm going to try it in a different color. I'm giving it 3 stars instead of 4 because the packaging is a bit of an annoyance to open. The container is quite stiff to move and when I was able to pry it open I'd ended up getting my fingers in the product. I suppose it is better than having the lid flopping around all willy nilly. But still an annoyance nonetheless.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Dark', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: AMAZING FOR DARK SKIN, OILY AND/OR TEXURED!
review_content:
I HAVE ALL 3 colors !! AMAZING FOR DARK SKIN!! They show up and are vibrant but can be sheered down. I’m a Fenty 420, Lancôme 500, too faced Chai and all colors are great.. if you are darker then Magic hour will just appear to be a peachy dewy highlight . Coming from someone who grew up hating cream products because they would be greasy, slide all over the face and take off makeup while blending.. these are opposite! I love how makeup companies are getting more scientifically advanced because these cream products are improving for the better. These can go into of my full beat faves without taking off my makeup and over my bare face as a gooey blush. It glides over my skin texture and acne unlike powder highlights, and it STAYS PUT!! Wherever you lay this blush, even though it’s a cream it stays out. It won’t transfer all over your face or cheek. The formula is dewy but not like a thin dewy.. I honestly hate dewy formulas because they rub off so quick even with powder but this formula is a thick, touch cream.. I thick it’s because they add powder to it to make it a thick formula that stays out. These blushes make my cheekbones pop so much because of the glow it gives, I keep my whole face matte and add these to my cheeks.. my cheeks are so defined and glowy because of the contrast. I wore these in the Caribbean a month ago and they didn’t travel around my face in the heat!! They didn’t melt off or act like Vaseline or lipstick(I hate those formulas) . Dark skin people looking for cream blushes that don’t rub off like this lipstick, creamy formulas..!! Buy!! Oily and textured skin people!! These float over acne and texture and are not oily or clogging!! The formula is like now other!! If you are scared to try a cream product, TRY THESE!! No oily, greasy mess but give you that sweaty, oily shine!! NO OTHER

review_content: Packaging is simple but sturdy. I love the color for my skin, and I think this shade would also work for lighter and darker skin tone. The formula is good too, not too sticky, pigmented- but doesn't last long! It would take 2hrs tops for this to stay on my cheeks. And it's not as pigmented when I applied it on my lips. Ended up returning this.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Lovely colour especially for the months where my skin is much fairer than the summer! I bought this based on KJH using it a number of times on Insta and now use it all the time! It's my go-to blush! Also a great price point!

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Looks different at online, but still a banger!
review_content: I was unimpressed and ready to return it. It wasn't as bright as it seemed online. However I was so surprised when I put it on just how beautiful it was. Not sticky, buildable so it can be a sheer wash or a nice punch. On my lips it was ok but I do love to do a monochromatic look with it on my eyes and but mixed with a little Fenty gloss on my lips for a nice shine. I might check out the redder one too.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Absolutely LOVE this product! Beautiful color, high level of pigmentation, so a little goes a long way. Gorgeous finish that is semi-dewy and natural. I’m contemplating buying the two other colors.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm

review_content: THE BEST CREAM BLUSH IVE EVER USED!!!! I have a large collection of cream blushes and this is the most beautiful one I have! I'm telling all my friends to buy this for their quarantine glow!!!

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I was in the market for a cream blush and came across this one. I have oily skin and this works great for me! I dab it across my cheeks, a little on my nose/nose bridge and a little on my temples. It gives me an all over glow. Pigment is definitely there- a little goes such a long way. It's great for non-makeup days when I want to look healthy and flushed. On full make-up days, I use this and set it with powder blush. It makes the longevity last way longer.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Pigmentation is buildable, the formula is easy to blend, and this color is stunning. The product looks natural on the skin. Definitely one if my favorite cream blushes! I want to try more from this brand!

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love this!! Got it in the shade magic hour and it’s so pretty. Blends out really easily with a sponge and gives this really nice glowy, lifted effect. It is smaller than I thought it would be and I can see it getting a little messy if you aren’t careful, but overall, I’m really happy with it. Perfect for light makeup days.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
This color is beautiful for someone who is looking for a slightly "sunburnt" flush that'll leave you looking healthy. The texture is very "balmy" and melts into your skin. It leaves a very slight sheen on the skin that looks healthy and glowy but does not look sweaty or too heavy; however, this sheen may come off as being sticky as some people have noted in their review. I personally have not come across this issue but this may be bc I have drier skin. The product is also super pigmented so a little goes a long way. My skintone is light with a slight tan right now and this gives the perfect "ive been to the beach" look without having to go outside cause we're in quaratine lol. I think the coral will look GORGEOUS on darker skin tones as well!!

review_content: I bought this instead of Glossier’s cloud paint in “dusk” and I’m glad I did! product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 13-17', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I LOVE THIS BLUSH! I prefer cream makeup because I have dry skin, and this is the only cream blush that I've tried that lasts until you remover your makeup. It's very blendable and buildable.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
this is definitely a dupe for glossier cloud paint in dawn !! the consistency is totally different tho. I expected it to be more “creamy” which it is, but it also reminds me a lot of chapstick which makes sense since it’s a balm. the color is super pretty and it’s super pigmented, this would last u forever and it’s also very dewy !! although, when i paired it with my bare minerals complexion rescue it totally broke up the makeup and didnt work, i tried applying w my fingers and a brush and it just wiped away my base rather than sit on top. I haven’t tried it w any other face products though. overall, it’s a good product & the packaging is really nice !!

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 13-17', 'Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I have very dry pale skin and I love cream products. This really feels similar in texture to a lip balm and is a beautiful colour (even for really pale skin). I get compliments on my make-up every time I wear this!! Definitely a must buy if you love cream blushes and don't wear a lot of foundation (I could see this moving a base layer around). It is easy to blend and is really good for beginners too.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Looks like make up, not ‘dewy sunkissed’
review_content:
All three shades are to light and ‘chalky’, which makes the colors just sit on your face in a very obvious way. I love cream blush, because it looks like skin is naturally luminous, as if after a workout. This stuff makes my cheeks looks painted like a doll’s — even the tiniest amount has a lot of pigment. Not for people who are into the movie makeup’ dewy look. If a burgundy/plum/wine shade could be added, maybe I’ll give it another try, but the peachy girly pepto bismol undertones are just too artificial-looking.

product_name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Tinted Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: GREAT color payoff + NO metal in packaging!
review_content:
FINALLY!! A clean beauty blush that is EVERYTHING I look for! The Happy Hour color seriously PACKS a punch of COLOR! I was a little surprised when I first tried it (Let's just say you can use a lighter hand than you might expect if you're used to working with other clean beauty blushes that are a whole lot waxier!) Formula is very creamy, great for lips and not too sticky! ☺️ My FAV part about it is the PACKAGING though! It can be a little hard to open BUT so worth it because this is *solid plastic*... which means absolutely NO metal tray at the bottom!!! To ALL my fellow sensitive skin ladies out there with nickle or metal allergies, you CAN FINALLY use an ENTIRE product without those breakouts that come when you hit pan!!!!

review_content: I bought this in Magic Hour and I love it! It's easy to apply and blend with my fingers. It looks very natural and doesn't appear to sit on top of my skin. It's dewy but not greasy looking. I'm have fair, very warm toned, oily skin and the Magic Hour is perfect! I plan on buying the Golden Hour too. I like that it's not shimmery too.
